title: Basic Oil Change
description: A basic oil change service including oil filter replacement and fluid top-up.

facility.description: Replacement of the oil filter with a new one.
Topping up of essential fluids like coolant, brake fluid, and windshield washer fluid.

title: Wheel Alignment
description: Alignment service to ensure your wheels are properly aligned for optimal driving and tire wear.

facility.description: Thorough inspection to determine if alignment is required.
Precise adjustment of wheel angles as per manufacturer specifications.

title: Brake Pad Replacement
description: Replacement of worn brake pads with new ones to ensure effective braking performance.

facility.description: Comprehensive inspection of brake pads, rotors, and calipers.
Removal of old brake pads and installation of new ones.

title: Tire Rotation
description: Rotation of tires to ensure even wear and extend tire life.

facility.description: Inspection of tire condition, tread depth, and pressure.
Moving tires to different positions to promote even wear.

title: Engine Tune-up
description: Comprehensive tune-up service to optimize engine performance and fuel efficiency.

facility.description: Replacement of spark plugs with new ones.
Replacement of air filter to ensure proper airflow.
Cleaning of fuel injectors and throttle body for better fuel delivery.

title: Coolant Flush
description: Flush and replacement of old coolant to prevent overheating and corrosion.

facility.description: Draining of old coolant from the cooling system.
Thorough flushing of the system to remove any residue.
Refilling the system with fresh coolant.

title: Transmission Fluid Change
description: Replacement of old transmission fluid with new fluid for smooth gear shifting.

facility.description: Draining of old transmission fluid.
Replacement of transmission filter (if applicable).
Refilling the transmission with new fluid.

title: Battery Replacement
description: Replacement of old battery with a new one for reliable starting power.

facility.description: Testing battery condition and performance.
Removal of old battery and installation of new one.

title: Exhaust System Repair
description: Repair and replacement of exhaust system components to ensure proper exhaust flow and reduce noise.

facility.description: Thorough inspection of exhaust system for leaks and damage.
Replacement of damaged or worn-out exhaust components.

title: Full Service Package
description: Comprehensive package including oil change, filter replacement, fluid top-up, and inspection of major components.

facility.description: Replacement of engine oil and oil filter.
Top-up of essential fluids like coolant, brake fluid, and windshield washer fluid.
Thorough inspection of brakes, suspension, steering, and other major components.
